languages: understands all languages but can't speak

special_traits.name: Immutable Form
special_traits.description: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

special_traits.name: Magic Resistance
special_traits.description: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_traits.description: The golem's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 16). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The golem makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Data Shard
actions.description: On a hit, the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

reactions.name: Redirect Data Flow
reactions.description: When the golem is targeted by a spell that requires a ranged attack roll, it can use its reaction to force the attacker to reroll the attack against another creature of the golem's choice within 30 feet.

legendary_actions.description: The golem can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The golem regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

actions.name: Detect
actions.description: The golem makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

actions.name: Syntax Error (Costs 3 Actions)
actions.description: The golem targets one creature it can see within 60 feet. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or use its reaction to make a melee attack against one of its allies.

mythic_actions.trigger: If the golem is a Mythic creature and is reduced to 0 hit points, it doesn't die or fall unconscious. Instead, its core reboots, it regains all its hit points, and it can now use Mythic Actions.

actions.name: Hard Reboot
actions.description: (Immediately after the trigger) The golem ends one spell effect on itself and can move up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

actions.name: Overclock
actions.description: (At the end of its turn) The golem makes one Slam attack. This attack has advantage.
